definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: This machine is suitable for severing process of die cutting ruler.
sentences.chinese: 適用於模切刀線的切斷工序。

sentences.english: Employ flat cutter and circular cutter for different materials.
sentences.chinese: 配軠平切刀和賀盤切刀供用戶選擇使用。

sentences.chinese: 配軠平切刀和賀盤切刀供用戶選擇使用。

sentences.english: Calculation method for outline of hobbing cutter with double dish was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種雙排滾切刀廓形的計算方法。

sentences.english: Hot-melt cutter can be installed for color belt, nylon weave and so on.
sentences.chinese: 可加裝熱融切刀，適用於彩色帶，尼龍編織等。

sentences.english: Elasticity cool cutting blade , long time to use.
To ensure a smooth cut, dip the end of your knife in water.
sentences.chinese: 爲了確保可以順滑切刀，你的刀鋒尖浸一下水。

sentences.english: The curve-edged hobbing cutter is used in producing rectangular wing sanitary napkin.
sentences.chinese: 曲線刃滾切刀是用來加工護翼衛生巾的專用刀具。

sentences.english: The sampling tool is a paper products for a special cutter physical performance tests.
sentences.chinese: 本取樣刀是造紙產品適用於物理性能試驗的專用切刀。

sentences.english: Simultaneously a splitting knife cuts the fruit into halves.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，一片快速切刀將桃切成兩瓣。
